section.title: Naïve Styles
section.p: The paragraphs are separated with double returns — the output should not. All paragraphs use the “Normal” style, except the lists which use Word’s automatically applied “List Paragraph” style. Lists are applied using the toolbar / autoformat functions. The direct font formatting in the following paragraph should convert to spans with classes.
